content: optional stuff the ornament from the top hole make sure you have closed the bottom hole once the ornament is stuffed close up the top hole use your crochet hook to hide the remaining tail if necessary you can also use your crochet hook to pull a small piece of yarn through the top in order to hang your ornament charts © 2018 annah wadler © 2018 annah wadler tuo tnirp ot trahc knalb nwo ruoy ngised dna tnemanro dezilanosrep © 2018 annah wadler elpmaxe
